nodes.documentation:
This strategy is for the yCRV vault, i.e., the underlying token is yCRV. It is not to accept
stable coins. It will farm the CRV crop. For liquidation, it swaps CRV into DAI and uses DAI
to produce yCRV.
nodes.name: CRVStrategyYCRV

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The sender has to be the controller, governance, or vault"

arguments.value: The sender has to be the controller, governance, or vault

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The sender has to be the controller, governance, or vault"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "token is defined as not salvageable"

arguments.value: token is defined as not salvageable

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "token is defined as not salvageable"

nodes.documentation: Salvages a token. We should not be able to salvage CRV and yCRV (underlying).
nodes.name: salvage

nodes.documentation: Withdraws yCRV from the investment pool that mints crops.
nodes.name: withdrawYCrvFromPool

nodes.documentation: Withdraws the yCRV tokens to the pool in the specified amount.
nodes.name: withdrawToVault

nodes.documentation: Withdraws all the yCRV tokens to the pool.
nodes.name: withdrawAllToVault

nodes.documentation: Invests all the underlying yCRV into the pool that mints crops (CRV_.
nodes.name: investAllUnderlying

nodes.documentation:
Claims the CRV crop, converts it to DAI on Uniswap, and then uses DAI to mint yCRV using the
Curve protocol.
nodes.name: claimAndLiquidateCrv

nodes.documentation: Claims and liquidates CRV into yCRV, and then invests all underlying.
nodes.name: doHardWork

nodes.documentation: Investing all underlying.
nodes.name: investedUnderlyingBalance

nodes.documentation: Converts all DAI to yCRV using the CRV protocol.
